cvrfdoc.DocumentTitle: Red Hat Bug Fix Advisory: Migration Toolkit for Containers (MTC) 1.4.6 release advisory

DocumentNotes.Note: The Migration Toolkit for Containers (MTC) 1.4.6 is now available.

The Migration Toolkit for Containers (MTC) enables you to migrate Kubernetes resources, persistent volume data, and internal container images between OpenShift Container Platform clusters, using the MTC web console or the Kubernetes API.

This content is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/). If you distribute this content, or a modified version of it, you must provide attribution to Red Hat Inc. and provide a link to the original.

Notes.Note: libwebp: heap-based buffer overflow in PutLE16()

Remediation.Description:
Before applying this update, ensure all previously released errata relevant to your system have been applied.
For details on how to apply this update, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258
For details on how to install and use MTC, refer to:
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.7/migration-toolkit-for-containers/installing-mtc.html

Reference.Description: bz#1956919: CVE-2018-25011 libwebp: heap-based buffer overflow in PutLE16()
